import Fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; import { API_KEY } from '../API_KEY'; const Index = props => { console.log(props.popularMovieResult) return (

Welcome to the Movie App

Data: {props.popularMovieResult.page}

First slide label

Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue mollis interdum.

Second slide label

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Third slide label

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.

) } Index.getInitialProps = async () => { const res = await fetch(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=${API_KEY}&language=en-US&page=1`); const data = await res.json(); return { popularMovieResult: data, moviePosters: data.results } } export default Index;
